snippet: The liberal legal scholar Laurence H. Tribe, who taught Barack Obama at Harvard, represents the coal company Peabody Energy in its challenge to E.P.A. rules.
abstract: Harvard Law Prof Laurence H Tribe's emergence as leading legal opponent of Pres Obama's global warming policy surprises many, since Obama worked under Tribe at Harvard and Tribe served in his administration; Tribe has been retained by Peabody Energy to block Environmental Protection Agency's regulations on carbon dioxide emissions.
lead_paragraph: The liberal legal scholar Laurence H. Tribe, who taught Barack Obama at Harvard, represents the coal company Peabody Energy in its challenge to E.P.A. rules.

headline.main: Laurence Tribe Fights Climate Case Against Star Pupil From Harvard, President Obama
headline.print_headline: Harvard Professor vs. Star Pupil in Climate Case
